ygData.subject: New Racewar Server
ygData.msgSnippet: Well everyone, the race war server came up and it went down with a hard, meaty..bone crushing THUD the other night. I spoke with Tech support about it and they
ygData.messageBody:
Well everyone, the race war server came up and it went down with a hard,
meaty..bone crushing THUD the other night. I spoke with Tech support about
it and they said they expected maybe 3000 people at best and NOT 5000 !!
They arent sure how long the server can handle the load, but they are
buying NEW servers JUST for racewar! Woo HOO! Guess it was a LOT more
popular than most thought it would be!

Sandy Collier
